Wisdom: الشَّهْوَةُ تُغْرِي
enWisdom: Lust entices

Wisdom: امْنَعْ نَفْسَكَ مِنَ الشَّهَوَاتِ تَسْلَمْ مِنَ الْآفَاتِ
enWisdom: Restrain your soul from lustful desires and you will remain safe from calamities

Wisdom: اهْجُرُوا الشَّهَوَاتِ فَإِنَّهَا تَقُودُكُمْ إِلَى رُكُوبِ الذُّنُوبِ وَالتَّهَجُّمِ عَلَى السَّيِّئَاتِ
enWisdom: Turn your back on lustful desires, for indeed they drive you to perform sinful acts and to fall upon evil deeds

Wisdom: إِيَّاكُمْ وَتَحَكُّمَ الشَّهَوَاتِ عَلَيْكُمْ فَإِنَّ عَاجِلَهَا ذَمِيمٌ وَآجِلَهَا وَخِيمٌ
enWisdom: Beware of allowing lustful desires to dominate you, for indeed its immediate result is dispraised and future consequence is detrimental

Wisdom: إِيَّاكُمْ وَغَلَبَةَ الشَّهَوَاتِ عَلَى قُلُوبِكُمْ فَإِنَّ بِدَايَتَهَا مَلَكَةٌ وَنِهَايَتَهَا هَلَكَةٌ
enWisdom: Beware of letting lustful desires overpower you hearts, for indeed its beginning is bondage and its end is destruction

Wisdom: أَزْرَى بِنَفْسِهِ مَنْ مَلَكَتْهُ الشَّهْوَةُ وَاسْتَعْبَدَتْهُ الْمَطَامِعُ
enWisdom: He who is controlled by lustful desires and enslaved by [worldly] aspirations has degraded his soul

Wisdom: أَضْيَقُ النَّاسِ حَالًا مَنْ كَثُرَتْ شَهْوَتُهُ وَكَبُرَتْ هِمَّتُهُ وَزَادَتْ مَئُونَتُهُ وَقَلَّتْ مَعُونَتُهُ
enWisdom: The person living in the most straitened circumstances is one whose desire is much, whose endeavour is great and whose provisions are plenty but his support is less

Wisdom: إِنَّكُمْ إِنْ مَلَّكْتُمْ شَهَوَاتِكُمْ نَزَتْ بِكُمْ إِلَى الْأَشَرِ وَالْغَوَايَةِ
enWisdom: Verily if you are controlled by your lustful desires, they will cause you to leap into frivolity and error

Wisdom: إِذَا أَبْصَرَتِ الْعَيْنُ الشَّهْوَةَ عَمِيَ الْقَلْبُ عَنِ الْعَاقِبَةِ
enWisdom: When the eye sees what is [lustfully] desired, the heart becomes blind to the consequence

Wisdom: إِذَا غَلَبَتْ عَلَيْكَ الشَّهْوَةُ فَاغْلِبْهَا بِالاخْتِصَارِ
enWisdom: When lust tries to overcome you then defeat it by curtailing excesses

Wisdom: بِمِلْكِ الشَّهْوَةِ التَّنَزُّهُ عَنْ كُلِّ عَابٍ
enWisdom: By controlling [one’s] lust, one becomes free of every flaw

Wisdom: زِيَادَةُ الشَّهْوَةِ تُزْرِي بِالْمُرُوءَةِ
enWisdom: Increased lust degrades magnanimity

Wisdom: ضِرَامُ الشَّهْوَةِ تَبْعَثُ [يَبْعَثُ‏] عَلَى تَلَفِ الْمُهْجَةِ
enWisdom: The flame of lust induces the impairment [and destruction] of the soul

Wisdom: غَلَبَةُ الشَّهْوَةِ تُبْطِلُ الْعِصْمَةَ وَتُورِدُ الْهُلْكَ
enWisdom: Being overpowered by lust nullifies preservation [of oneself from sin] and leads to destruction

Wisdom: قَالَ ع فِي مَنْ ذَمَّهُ قَدْ خَرَقَتِ الشَّهَوَاتُ عَقْلَهُ وَأَمَاتَتْ قَلْبَهُ وَوَلَّهَتْ عَلَيْهَا نَفْسَهُ
enWisdom: Desires have rent asunder his intellect and killed his heart while his mind is infatuated with them

Wisdom: قَرِينُ الشَّهْوَةِ مَرِيضُ النَّفْسِ مَعْلُولُ الْعَقْلِ
enWisdom: The associate of lust has a sick soul and a troubled mind

Wisdom: كَمْ مِنْ شَهْوَةٍ مَنَعَتْ رُتْبَةً
enWisdom: How many a lustful desire has prevented [one from attaining] a lofty status!

Wisdom: مَنْ زَادَتْ شَهْوَتُهُ قَلَّتْ مُرُوَّتُهُ
enWisdom: NULL

Wisdom: مَنْ غَلَبَتْ عَلَيْهِ شَهْوَتُهُ لَمْ تَسْلَمْ نَفْسُهُ
enWisdom: Whoever is overcome by his lust, his soul will not be safe

Wisdom: مَنْ أَهْمَلَ نَفْسَهُ فِي لَذَّاتِهَا شَقِيَ وَبَعُدَ
enWisdom: Whoever neglects his soul [as it indulges] in its pleasures becomes wretched and distanced [from the mercy of Allah]

Wisdom: مَنْ كَثُرَتْ شَهْوَتُهُ ثَقُلَتْ مَئُونَتُهُ
enWisdom: One whose lust increases, [the expense for] his provision becomes heavy

Wisdom: مَنْ غَرِيَ بِالشَّهَوَاتِ أَبَاحَ نَفْسَهُ الْغَوَائِلَ
enWisdom: One who is enticed by lustful desires permits his soul to be a target of calamities

Wisdom: غَلَبَةُ الشَّهْوَةِ أَعْظَمُ هُلْكٍ وَمِلْكُهَا أَشْرَفُ مِلْكٍ
enWisdom: Being overpowered by lust is the greatest destruction, and controlling it is the most honourable dominance

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يُدَاوِ شَهْوَتَهُ بِالتَّرْكِ [لَهَا] لَمْ يَزَلْ عَلِيلًا
enWisdom: One who has not remedied his lust by abandoning it is still sick

Wisdom: لَا تُسْرِفْ فِي شَهْوَتِكَ وَغَضَبِكَ فَيُزْرِيَا بِكَ
enWisdom: Do not exceed the limits in your lust and anger as they will degrade you
